asset.name: empasiprubart
asset.description: Potent C2 sweeping antibody for complement-mediated diseases

biology.function: C2 is a component of the classical and lectin complement pathways. C2 cleavage is required for formation of C3 convertase, which amplifies complement activation
biology.mechanism: Empasiprubart is a 'sweeping' antibody that binds C2 and accelerates its clearance from circulation, leading to sustained complement inhibition
biology.differentiation: Sweeping mechanism provides sustained C2 depletion

genetic_validation.rationale: Complement activation implicated in multiple autoimmune and inflammatory diseases; C2 deficiency is the most common complement deficiency in humans, generally well-tolerated

rationale: Complement activation drives pathology in many neurological and autoimmune diseases
Upstream inhibition may provide broader effect than C5 inhibitors
C2 sweeping provides sustained complement suppression
Differentiated from established C5 inhibitors (eculizumab, ravulizumab)
why_good_target.potential_indications: MMN, CIDP, MG combination, and other complement-mediated diseases

mechanism.description: Empasiprubart binds complement C2 and accelerates its degradation through a 'sweeping' mechanism, leading to sustained reduction in C2 levels and inhibition of classical/lectin complement pathway activation

phase_2_results.observation: Sustained improved grip strength in MMN through ARDA Phase 2 and ARDA+ Open Label Extension

mg_combination.rationale: Combine FcRn inhibition (IgG reduction) with complement inhibition for enhanced efficacy

mmn.disease_burden: Progressive, often misdiagnosed as ALS; severe disability in 20%

cidp.strategy: Second MOA after VYVGART; potential for combination or sequential use

c5_inhibitors.eculizumab_soliris: Approved for multiple indications (PNH, aHUS, gMG, NMOSD)

empasiprubart_differentiation: Upstream inhibition may provide broader/different efficacy
Sustained C2 depletion vs intermittent C5 blockade

investment_analysis.stage_value: Phase 3 - high value inflection with MMN readout in 4Q 2026
investment_analysis.competitive_position: Novel mechanism vs established C5 inhibitors

commercial_potential.combination_potential: Synergy with VYVGART in MG and other indications

catalysts.significance: First Phase 3 for empasiprubart; >$1B market opportunity
Second molecule in CIDP; combination potential
